dt: {bc}generally pleasing and engaging often because of a childlike charm and innocence

et: Middle English {it}winsum{/it}, from Old English {it}wynsum{/it}, from {it}wynn{/it} joy; akin to Old High German {it}wunna{/it} joy, Latin {it}venus{/it} desire {ma}{mat|win|}{/ma}
shortdef: generally pleasing and engaging often because of a childlike charm and innocence
